meanings.definition: In no way; not at all.
meanings.sent1: Noways can I finish this puzzle.
meanings.sent2: I noways want to eat broccoli.
meanings.sent3: Noways will I wear that silly hat.
meanings.sent4: The cat noways caught the fast mouse.
meanings.sent5: She noways believed his outrageous story.

meanings.sent1: Noways will I agree to that plan.
meanings.sent3: Noways did he expect to see a flying pig.
meanings.sent4: The idea noways crossed her mind.
meanings.sent5: He noways imagined he would win the race.
